column5: That is amazing resolve! I will keep you in my prayers and may God work within you and cure you of your addiction.
Things will get better, hope you find some peace. I will pray for you. May God bless you. He has a plan for you!
I will keep you in my prayers. May God help you and your family find peace during this difficult time.
the way his dad's face lights up! so sweet!
That's awesome work!! Keep it up :)
